title: Implement 4-Day Work Week Trial
description: Proposal to implement a 6-month trial of a 4-day work week (32 hours) while maintaining current salary levels. This would improve work-life balance and potentially increase productivity based on successful trials at other companies.

additional_info.context: Multiple studies show 4-day work weeks can increase productivity while reducing employee burnout and improving retention rates.
additional_info.implementation: If approved, trial would begin next quarter with monthly progress reviews.
additional_info.success_criteria: Maintained productivity levels, improved employee satisfaction scores, and stable client service delivery
